metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5734 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the legacy theme preview implementation in wp-includes/theme.php in WordPress before 4.2.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted string.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5734` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.2.4+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.2.4+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.2.4+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfourteen - 4.2.4+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.2.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.4+dfsg-1').
